analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nanahetuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na na hetum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
na hetunā anidassana sa paṭigha mūle pi

original: Nahetuṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na hetu anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
